text: Dughiar kamɨn ikegha zui, Gideon ziar igiam iti. An afeziam Joas kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Gideon asɨghasɨghizir ofa gamir dakozir kam, kar Balɨn bizim. Kamaghɨn, Bal uabɨ uabɨn akuragh.” Kamaghɨn, me “Jerubal,” Gideon gatɨ.6:32 Ziar kam Jerubal, an tiarim Hibrun akamɨn kamaghɨn ghu, “Bal uabɨ uabɨn akuragh.”
